item.title: 香港可能会在施政报告中寻求重振陷入困境的房地产市场
item.description:
Summary:
  • Expected focus on property, economic revival and security-media

    预计关注房地产、经济复苏和安全媒体
  • Property stamp duties could be trimmed for some

    部分房产印花税可能会被削减
  • Childbirth cash incentive expected amid manpower crunch

    人力紧缺，预计生育现金奖励
  • National security expected to be emphasized

    国家安全有望得到重视

Hong Kong is expected to announce lower stamp duties for some property transactions in an annual policy statement on Wednesday that will focus on stabilising an economy hurt by mass emigration from the city and economic weakness on the mainland.

预计香港将在周三的年度政策声明中宣布降低部分房地产交易的印花税，该声明的重点是稳定因香港大规模移民和内地经济疲软而受到损害的经济。

Speaking a day before he was due to present policy plans to the legislature, Hong Kong Chief Executive John Lee said the focus would be on stimulating the economy and improving people's livelihoods.

香港行政长官李家超在向立法会提交政策计划的前一天表示，重点将放在刺激经济和改善民生上。

For the property market - a major pillar of the economy - local media say Lee is expected to trim stamp duties for some, but not all property transactions.

对于作为经济主要支柱的房地产市场，当地媒体表示，李预计将削减部分而非全部房地产交易的印花税。

The business community and home-owners want the government to roll back decade-long cooling measures that aimed to curb speculative activities in one of the world's priciest markets.

商界和房主希望政府取消长达十年的降温措施，这些措施旨在遏制世界上最昂贵的市场之一的投机活动。

Home prices surged nearly 300% in the decade to 2019, when Hong Kong was rocked by anti-government mass protests, the COVID pandemic, and a subsequent braindrain of hundreds of thousands of people amid a national security crackdown.

截至 2019 年的十年间，香港房价飙升近 300%，当时香港受到反政府大规模抗议、新冠疫情大流行以及随后在国家安全镇压中导致数十万人流失的冲击。

Since then home prices have fallen 13%, amid rising interest rates and a bleak economic outlook.

此后，由于利率上升和经济前景黯淡，房价下跌了13%。

In August, property prices dropped to a seven-month low, and realtors expect them to end 2023 as much as 5% down.

8 月份，房地产价格跌至七个月低点，房地产经纪人预计 2023 年底房价将下跌 5%。

Transaction volumes have shrunk in both the luxury and broader markets, reflecting weak sentiment, with the number of residential mortgage loans in negative equity cases expected to rise above 10,000 in September, approaching an 18-year high recorded in the fourth quarter of last year.

奢侈品市场和大盘市场的交易量均出现萎缩，反映出市场情绪疲软，预计 9 月份负资产案例中的住宅抵押贷款数量将升至 10,000 笔以上，接近去年第四季度创下的 18 年来新高。

"Even if the government reviews and relaxes certain stamp duty measures in the future, although this may bring stability and restore some confidence among potential buyers during the downward cycle, we believe that property prices will continue to fluctuate for a while," said Rosanna Tang, Hong Kong head of research at Cushman & Wakefield, a property consultancy.

Rosanna Tang表示：“即使政府未来检讨并放宽某些印花税措施，虽然这可能会在下行周期带来稳定并恢复潜在买家的一些信心，但我们认为房价仍将持续波动一段时间。” ，房地产咨询公司戴德梁行（Cushman & Wakefield）香港研究主管。

Hong Kong's economy is expected to grow 4% this year after contracting 3.5% in 2022.

香港经济在 2022 年收缩 3.5%后，预计今年将增长 4% 。

Last year, Lee announced measures to attract top international talent to the city. These schemes have had some success, but applicants have been mostly from mainland China.

去年，李宣布了吸引顶尖国际人才来到这座城市的措施。这些计划取得了一些成功，但申请者大多来自中国大陆。

Hong Kong, like mainland China, is also facing a demographic challenge with falling birth-rates. Local media reported Lee might offer a cash bonus for babies born to one local parent.

与中国大陆一样，香港也面临着出生率下降的人口挑战。当地媒体报道称，李可能会为当地父母所生的婴儿提供现金奖励。

Lee, who was sanctioned by the U.S. government for his role in cracking down on freedoms, is also expected to emphasize the importance of maintaining a tight national security grip - a priority for Chinese leader Xi Jinping.

因压制自由而受到美国政府制裁的李明博预计还将强调维持严格国家安全控制的重要性——这是中国领导人习近平的首要任务。

Despite Hong Kong's attempts to restore the city's international reputation and lure more capital, further security legislation including anti-espionage laws are expected to be enacted in the near term.

尽管香港试图恢复该城市的国际声誉并吸引更多资本，但预计近期将颁布包括反间谍法在内的进一步安全立法。

Some Western governments have criticised the ongoing national security clamp down, which has led to the imprisonment of many opposition democrats and closure of liberal media outlets.

一些西方政府批评了正在进行的国家安全压制，这导致许多反对派民主党人被监禁，自由派媒体机构被关闭。

($1 = 7.8229 Hong Kong dollars)

(1 美元 = 7.8229 港元)

Additional reporting by Jessie Pang; Donny Kwok; Editing by Anne Marie Roantree and Simon Cameron-Moore

item.title: 谁将竞选台湾下一任总统？
item.description:
Taiwan is set to vote on Jan. 13 in presidential and parliamentary elections, held once every four years.

台湾定于1月13日举行每四年举行一次的总统和议会选举。

Here is a list of the candidates standing for president and their positions on relations with China:

以下是总统候选人名单及其对华关系立场：

LAI CHING-TE

Lai, also known by his English name William, is running for the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP). Currently Taiwan's vice president, he is also the DPP's chairman, and has consistently led opinion polls.

黎智英的英文名William，正在竞选执政的民进党（DPP）。现任台湾副总统，同时也是民进党主席，在民意调查中一直领先。

Lai, along with Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen, have repeatedly offered talks with China but been rebuffed, as Beijing views them both as separatists.

赖清德和台湾总统蔡英文曾多次提出与中国进行会谈，但遭到拒绝，因为北京将他们视为分裂分子。

Lai and Tsai say only Taiwan's people can decide their future.

赖和蔡表示，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

HOU YU-IH

Hou is the candidate for Taiwan's main opposition party the Kuomintang (KMT), whose government fled to the island in 1949 after losing a civil war with Mao Zedong's communists.

侯是台湾主要反对党国民党的候选人，国民党政府在与毛泽东领导的共产党的内战中失败后于 1949 年逃往台湾。

Hou is the mayor of Taipei's neighbouring city New Taipei. He was re-elected in a landslide last year but has generally been running third in presidential election opinion polls.

侯是台北邻近城市新北的市长。去年他以压倒性优势再次当选，但在总统选举民意调查中总体排名第三。

The KMT traditionally favours close ties with China but strongly denies being pro-Beijing. Hou has said he will restart talks with Beijing.

国民党传统上倾向于与中国建立密切关系，但强烈否认亲北京。侯先生表示，他将重启与北京的谈判。

KO WEN-JE

Ko, a former Taipei mayor, is the candidate for the small Taiwan People's Party. Some polls have put him catching up quickly with Lai, though most have put him in second place.

柯曾任台北市市长，是小型台湾人民党的候选人。一些民意调查显示他很快追上了黎，但大多数民意调查都把他排在第二位。

China should propose a new framework for engagement with Taiwan and explain what Beijing has to offer, Ko said on Tuesday.

柯周二表示，中国应该提出一个与台湾接触的新框架，并解释北京可以提供什么。

TERRY GOU

Gou is the billionaire founder of major Apple supplier Foxconn (2317.TW), though no longer runs the company. He is running as an independent but is polling very low.

郭台铭是苹果主要供应商富士康（2317.TW）的亿万富翁创始人，但不再经营该公司。他以独立人士身份参选，但民调支持率很低。

Gou has accused the ruling DPP of taking the island to the brink of war with China by its hostile policies and that only he, with his extensive business and personal contacts in China and the U.S., can maintain peace.

郭台铭指责执政的民进党通过其敌对政策将台湾推向与中国战争的边缘，只有他凭借在中美两国广泛的商业和个人关系才能维持和平。

Writing by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Sonali Paul

item.title: 富士康调查成为选举问题，台湾领先者攻击中国
item.description:
Summary:
  • Taiwan VP: China should 'cherish' Taiwanese companies

    台湾副总统：中国应该“珍惜”台湾企业
  • China probing tax affairs of Apple supplier Foxconn-sources

    中国调查苹果供应商富士康的税务问题-消息人士
  • Taiwan holding presidential election in January

    台湾1月举行总统选举

Taiwan Vice President Lai Ching-te on Tuesday hit out at China over its probe of major Apple (AAPL.O) supplier Foxconn (2317.TW), saying Beijing should "cherish" Taiwanese companies and not put pressure on them during an election.

台湾副总统赖清德周二抨击中国对苹果(AAPL.O)主要供应商富士康(2317.TW)的调查，称北京应该“珍惜”台湾公司，不要在选举期间向他们施加压力。

Foxconn is facing a tax probe in China, two sources close to the company said on Monday, confirming a report in China's state-backed Global Times.

两名接近该公司的消息人士周一表示，富士康正在中国面临税务调查，证实了中国政府支持的《环球时报》的报道。

The sources said they believed it was disclosed for political reasons tied to Taiwan's January elections where the company's founder Terry Gou is running as an independent candidate for president.

消息人士称，他们认为披露这一信息是出于与台湾一月份选举有关的政治原因，该公司创始人郭台铭作为独立候选人竞选总统。

The Global Times, in an English-language story late on Sunday, said by running, Gou might split the opposition vote, potentially ensuring a victory for Lai who is already leading in the polls.

《环球时报》周日晚间在英文报道中称，通过参选，郭台铭可能会平分反对派的选票，从而有可能确保已经在民意调查中领先的黎智英获胜。

China claims Taiwan as its own territory and Beijing detests Lai, whom it believes is a separatist. He says only Taiwan's people can decide their future, and Beijing has rebuffed his offers of talks.

中国声称台湾是自己的领土，北京憎恨黎智英，认为他是分裂分子。他说，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来，北京拒绝了他的会谈提议。

Taiwan's main opposition party the Kuomintang strongly denies being pro-Beijing, but has said it will restart talks with China if it wins and that it opposes formal independence for Taiwan.

台湾主要反对党国民党强烈否认亲北京，但表示如果获胜将重启与中国的谈判，并反对台湾正式独立。

Speaking at a news conference in Taipei and asked about Beijing's probe into Foxconn, Lai said China should "cherish and treasure" Taiwanese companies given their help in that country's economic development.

在台北举行的新闻发布会上，当被问及北京对富士康的调查时，黎智英表示，鉴于台湾企业对台湾经济发展的帮助，中国应该“珍惜和珍惜”。

"During an election, China does not need to put pressure on Taiwanese companies, demanding they declare a position, or even that they directly support a candidate they prefer," he said.

“在选举期间，中国不需要向台湾企业施加压力，要求他们表明立场，甚至直接支持他们喜欢的候选人，”他说。

Taiwanese companies will lose their confidence in China and if they feel scared will shift production elsewhere, which will be a big loss to China, Lai added.

赖补充说，台湾企业将失去对大陆的信心，如果他们感到害怕，就会将生产转移到其他地方，这对大陆来说将是一个巨大的损失。

Foxconn has been pushing to diversify its manufacturing base outside China to places such as India, which one of the sources said may have contributed to Beijing placing pressure on the company.

富士康一直在努力将其制造基地多元化到中国以外的地区，例如印度，其中一位消息人士表示，这可能是北京方面向该公司施加压力的原因之一。

Gou has not commented on the probe, with his campaign team referring questions to Foxconn and pointing out he is no longer involved in the company's day-to-day running, though he remains a big shareholder.

郭台铭尚未对调查发表评论，他的竞选团队将问题转交给富士康，并指出他不再参与该公司的日常运营，尽管他仍然是大股东。

Gou cancelled without explanation a campaign event originally scheduled for Monday evening, and has no events planned for Tuesday, according to his media team.

据郭台铭的媒体团队称，郭台铭在没有任何解释的情况下取消了原定于周一晚上举行的竞选活动，并且周二没有计划举行任何活动。

Foxconn said in a statement on Sunday that legal compliance was a "fundamental principle" of its operations, and it would "actively cooperate with the relevant units on the related work and operations".

富士康周日在一份声明中表示，合法合规是其运营的“基本原则”，将“积极配合相关单位做好相关工作和运营”。

Foxconn's shares extended their declines on Tuesday, closing down 2.2% compared to the broader market's (.TWII) 0.4% gain. Shares closed 2.9% lower on Monday.

富士康股价周二延续跌势，收盘下跌 2.2%，而大盘(.TWII)则上涨 0.4%。周一股价收盘下跌 2.9%。

INTERFERENCE ACCUSATIONS

Taiwan frequently accuses Beijing of seeking to exert pressure, whether military or economic, to sway the outcome of its elections to ensure an outcome favourable to China, whose government has not commented on the Foxconn probe.

台湾经常指责北京试图施加军事或经济压力，以影响其选举结果，以确保结果有利于中国，而中国政府尚未对富士康调查发表评论。

One senior Taiwanese security source, speaking on condition of anonymity as they were not authorised to speak to the media, told Reuters the government's assessment was that China's senior leadership was not happy with the Global Times story.

一位不愿透露姓名的台湾安全消息人士告诉路透社，政府的评估是中国高层领导层对《环球时报》的报道并不满意。

This is because the probe has been jumped on so quickly by the ruling Democratic Progressive Party, of which Lai is chairman, to accuse China of seeking to interfere in the election in a bid to win more support from voters, the source added.

消息人士补充说，这是因为黎智英担任主席的执政党民进党如此迅速地展开调查，指责中国试图干预选举，以赢得更多选民的支持。

Authorities in China have not yet confirmed the probe, which has not received further media coverage within the country.

中国当局尚未证实该调查，该调查尚未得到国内媒体的进一步报道。

Speaking at a separate event, former Taipei Mayor Ko Wen-je, who is running as presidential candidate for his Taiwan People's Party and is second to Lai in many polls, said China "which claims to be a world power" should explain the investigation.

前台北市市长柯文哲在另一场活动中发表讲话，他是台湾人民党的总统候选人，在多项民意调查中排名第二，仅次于黎智英，他表示，“自称世界强国”的中国应该对调查做出解释。

"The biggest problem in this matter is that the Taiwanese government has no way to communicate with the mainland on behalf of Taiwanese companies," Ko said.

“这件事最大的问题是台湾政府没有办法代表台湾企业与大陆沟通，”柯说。

China cut off a routine government-to-government talks mechanism with Taiwan after President Tsai Ing-wen took office in 2016.

2016年蔡英文总统上台后，中国切断了与台湾的例行政府间对话机制。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard and Yimou Lee; Additional reporting by Jeanny Kao; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Jamie Freed

Ben Blanchard 和 Yimou Lee 报道； Jeanny Kao 的补充报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和杰米·弗里德

item.title: 折扣电商公司拼多多创始人跻身中国富豪榜
item.description:
The founder of PDD Holdings (PDD.O) saw his wealth swell by $13.8 billion in a year, as a slowing global economy drove more shoppers to the Chinese company's discount e-commerce platforms Temu and Pinduoduo, an annual rich list showed on Tuesday.

周二公布的年度富豪榜显示，拼多多控股(PDD.O)创始人的财富在一年内增加了 138 亿美元，原因是全球经济放缓促使更多消费者前往这家中国公司的折扣电子商务平台特木和拼多多。

Colin Huang, who founded PDD in 2015 and stepped down as CEO in 2020, was the fastest riser in this year's Hurun Rich List, leaping seven places to be ranked China's third richest man with a $37.2 billion fortune. It also marked the first time he had broken into the top 3 ranking.

黄科林于 2015 年创立拼多多，并于 2020 年卸任首席执行官，是今年胡润富豪榜上升最快的人，跃升七位，以 372 亿美元的财富位列中国第三富豪。这也标志着他首次闯入前三名。

The growth of his fortune reflects the changing e-commerce landscape both in China, where consumer confidence remains low after three years of COVID curbs, and abroad where shopping platforms such as Temu and Shein are gaining steam. PDD did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

他的财富增长反映了中国电子商务格局的变化，在中国，经过三年的新冠疫情限制，消费者信心仍然低迷，而在国外，Temu和Shein等购物平台正在蓬勃发展。 PDD 没有立即回应置评请求。

Jack Ma, founder of rival Alibaba (9988.HK) which is currently going through a restructuring and working to fend off competition from the likes of PDD, fell one place from 2022 to 10th spot and the number of Alibaba shareholders on the list fell from 18 last year, to 12 this year.

其竞争对手阿里巴巴（9988.HK）的创始人马云目前正在进行重组，并努力抵御来自拼多多等公司的竞争，其排名较 2022 年下降一位至第十位，上榜阿里巴巴股东数量也从 2022 年下降了一位。去年是18个，今年是12个。

Richard Liu, who founded e-commerce giant JD.com, also saw his wealth, and that of his wife Zhang Zetian, fall by $6.2 billion since last year to $8.26 billion, according to Hurun's list.

根据胡润百富榜，电商巨头京东的创始人刘强东及其妻子章泽天的财富也自去年以来减少了 62 亿美元，降至 82.6 亿美元。

JD.com's shares fell to a record low earlier this month after banks cut its price targets citing a weaker-than-expected recovery in consumer spending.

本月早些时候，银行以消费者支出复苏弱于预期为由下调了价格目标，京东股价跌至历史新低。

"Going global has been one of the key sources of growth this year," said Rupert Hoogewerf, Hurun Report Chairman and Chief Researcher, citing PDD's Temu, ByteDance's short video platform TikTok and ultra-fast fashion brand Shein as examples.

胡润百富董事长兼首席研究员胡润表示，“出海是今年的主要增长源之一。”他以拼多多旗下Temu、字节跳动旗下短视频平台TikTok和超快时尚品牌Shein为例表示。

The founder of bottled water brand Nongfu Spring, Zhong Shanshan, retained his first place for the third year running on the list with a $62 billion fortune while Pony Ma, founder of social media and gaming giant Tencent (0700.HK) was second with $38.6 billion.

瓶装水品牌农夫山泉的创始人钟珊珊以 620 亿美元的财富连续第三年蝉联榜首，社交媒体和游戏巨头腾讯（0700.HK）创始人马化腾以 38.6 美元排名第二。十亿。

Hurun also said 179 individuals dropped off this year's list, which ranks China's wealthiest people with a minimum net worth of 5 billion yuan, 15% of which were in real estate, as the sector grapples with a prolonged debt crisis.

胡润还表示，今年有 179 人从净资产不低于 50 亿元人民币的中国最富有人士名单中跌出，其中 15% 从事房地产行业，因为该行业正在努力应对长期的债务危机。

Wang Jianlin, owner of Dalian Wanda Group and once China's richest man, saw his wealth and that of his family fall by $7.3 billion and 57 spots to be placed in 89th position with a $6.47 billion fortune.

大连万达集团老板、曾经的中国首富王健林发现，他和他的家族的财富减少了73亿美元，排名下降了57位，以64.7亿美元的财富排名第89位。

The founder of China Evergrande Group (3333.HK), the world's most indebted property developer, remained on the list at 268 place despite his company's woes, due to dividends paid out in previous years, Hurun said. Hui Ka Yan is currently being investigated over suspected "illegal crimes", Evergrande said last month.

胡润百富表示，尽管公司因前几年派发股息而陷入困境，但全球负债最多的房地产开发商中国恒大集团（3333.HK）的创始人仍位居榜单第268位。恒大上个月表示，许家印目前因涉嫌“违法犯罪”正在接受调查。

Reporting by Casey Hall; editing by Brenda Goh and Miral Fahmy

item.title: 交易陷入困境后，泰国计划用护卫舰替换中国潜艇
item.description:
The Thai government may buy a frigate instead of a submarine from China after the Chinese manufacturer was unable to include a German engine as specified in the original deal, Thailand's defence minister has said.

泰国国防部长表示，由于中国制造商无法按照最初协议的规定使用德国发动机，泰国政府可能会从中国购买一艘护卫舰，而不是一艘潜艇。

Thailand has already paid a 7 billion baht ($193.7 million) instalment to China for the purchase of one of three Yuan Class S26T submarines with German-made diesel engines, but the deal was delayed when Germany forbade the use of its engines for Chinese military exports.

泰国已向中国支付了 70 亿泰铢（1.937 亿美元）的分期付款，用于购买三艘配备德国制造柴油发动机的元级 S26T 潜艇，但由于德国禁止中国军品出口使用其发动机，该交易被推迟。

China has proposed replacing the German engines with Chinese-made equipment several rounds of negotiations did not yield a conclusive result.

中国提出用中国制造的设备取代德国发动机，几轮谈判都没有得出结论。

The new Thai government, which was sworn in last month after a May general election, said it has suggested during Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin's visit to Beijing for the Belt and Road Summit last week that it wants to buy a frigate instead of a submarine.

5月份大选后上个月宣誓就职的泰国新政府表示，在总理斯雷塔·塔维信上周访问北京参加“一带一路”峰会期间，泰国政府表示希望购买一艘护卫舰，而不是一艘潜艇。

"We have proposed to China and they are considering it," defence minister Sutin Klungsang told a local media outlet on Tuesday.

“我们已向中国提出建议，他们正在考虑，”国防部长苏丁·格隆桑周二对当地媒体表示。

Sutin said there would be further discussion on the new plan next month.

苏廷表示，下个月将进一步讨论新计划。

The defence minister said last week that procurement of submarine would be shelved for now and resume "when the country is ready".

国防部长上周表示，潜艇的采购将暂时搁置，并在“国家准备好时”恢复。

The previous government concluded an agreement to buy the first of the three submarines in 2017 for 13.5 billion baht ($373.55 million).

上届政府于 2017 年达成协议，斥资 135 亿泰铢（约合 3.7355 亿美元）购买三艘潜艇中的第一艘。

The order for the other two subs was approved by parliament in 2020 for 22.5 billion baht ($622.58 million).

另外两个潜艇的订单于 2020 年获得议会批准，金额为 225 亿泰铢（6.2258 亿美元）。

The Chinese submarine deal has attracted public criticism of the previous government, with the opposition and critics raising questions about whether was in the public interest, and whether submarines were necessary for security.

中国的潜艇交易引起了公众对前任政府的批评，反对派和批评人士质疑是否符合公共利益，以及潜艇是否对于安全而言是必要的。

The navy has said submarine procurement is vital to Thailand's long-term defence interests.

海军表示，潜艇采购对泰国的长期国防利益至关重要。

($1 = 36.1400 baht)

item.title: 中国长城汽车成为首家回应欧盟反补贴调查的电动汽车制造商
item.description:
China's Great Wall Motor said it had formally submitted responses to the European Commission's anti-subsidy investigation of Chinese-made electric vehicles (EVs), while calling for a fair and open trade environment.

中国长城汽车表示，已正式提交欧盟委员会对中国制造电动汽车反补贴调查的答复，同时呼吁公平、开放的贸易环境。

Tension between China and the EU is growing, partly because of Beijing's closer ties with Moscow after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, while the bloc seeks to cut reliance on the world's second-largest economy in its push for a green transition.

中国和欧盟之间的紧张关系正在加剧，部分原因是俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后北京与莫斯科的关系更加密切，而欧盟则寻求在推动绿色转型的过程中减少对世界第二大经济体的依赖。

"We need a fair and open trade environment," the automaker's president, Mu Feng, said on his Weibo social media account on Monday. "We have the confidence to win the competition globally."

“我们需要一个公平、开放的贸易环境，”该汽车制造商总裁穆锋周一在其微博社交媒体账户上表示。 “我们有信心赢得全球竞争。”

Great Wall, which provided its answers to the European Commission on Oct. 11, was the first automaker to have done so, he added.

他补充说，长城汽车于 10 月 11 日向欧盟委员会提供了答复，是第一家这样做的汽车制造商。

"Europe is one of the key strategic markets for Great Wall Motor," Mu said, adding that the company had big plans for the region, having begun site selection efforts for a plant there, envisaging full capabilities from production to sales.

“欧洲是长城汽车的关键战略市场之一。”穆说，并补充说，公司对该地区有宏伟的计划，已开始在那里选址工厂，设想从生产到销售的全面能力。

The Chinese company did not immediately respond to a request for comment on Tuesday.

这家中国公司周二没有立即回应置评请求。

Great Wall Motor plans to build a plant in Europe and Germany was one of the candidates for the site, the German publication Automobilwoche said in May.

德国《汽车周报》5月称，长城汽车计划在欧洲建厂，德国是该厂址的候选工厂之一。

Brussels began the investigation this month to decide whether to set up tariff barriers against what European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen has called a flood of cheaper Chinese EV imports benefiting from state subsidies.

布鲁塞尔本月开始调查，以决定是否针对欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉·冯德莱恩所说的受益于国家补贴的大量廉价中国电动汽车进口设置关税壁垒。

It is examining EVs made both by Chinese manufacturers and foreign firms, such as Tesla (TSLA.O), BMW (BMWG.DE) and Renault (RENA.PA), in China.

它正在审查中国制造商和外国公司在中国生产的电动汽车，例如特斯拉（TSLA.O） 、宝马（BMWG.DE）和雷诺（RENA.PA） 。

China has complained about the "very short" time the EU set for consultations on the inquiry, saying it lacked adequate evidence and did not conform to the rules of the World Trade Organization (WTO).

中国抱怨欧盟设定的调查磋商时间“非常短”，称其缺乏足够的证据，也不符合世界贸易组织(WTO)的规则。

European car makers are racing to catch up with China in turning out lower-cost EVs, especially as the likes of Chinese manufacturers BYD (002594.SZ), Xpeng (9868.HK) and Nio (9866.HK) look to expand overseas.

欧洲汽车制造商正在竞相赶上中国生产低成本电动汽车，特别是在中国制造商比亚迪（002594.SZ） 、小鹏汽车（9868.HK）和蔚来汽车（9866.HK）等中国制造商寻求海外扩张的情况下。

Great Wall Motor ranked eighth in terms of sales of pure electric and plug-in hybrid cars in China during the first nine months of the year, industry figures show.

行业数据显示，今年前九个月，长城汽车在中国纯电动和插电式混合动力汽车销量排名第八。

item.title: 中国将尽最大努力促进巴以和解——官方媒体
item.description:
China will do its utmost when it comes to contributing to Palestinian-Israeli reconciliation, its foreign minister told his Israeli counterpart in a phone call, according to Chinese state media.

据中国官方媒体报道，中国外交部长在电话中告诉以色列外长，中国将尽最大努力促进巴以和解。

China will firmly support any resolution as long as it is conducive to peace, Foreign Minister Wang Yi told Israel's Eli Cohen, calling the conflict a "major choice between war and peace", state media said on Tuesday.

官方媒体周二表示，外交部长王毅告诉以色列总理埃里·科恩，中国将坚定支持任何有利于和平的解决方案，并称这场冲突是“战争与和平之间的重大选择”。

Wang also called for Israel to take effective measures to protect the safety of Chinese citizens and institutions in the Middle East, adding that "all countries have the right to self-defence, but they should abide by international humanitarian law and protect the safety of civilians".

王毅还呼吁以色列采取有效措施保护中国在中东公民和机构的安全，并补充说，“各国都有权自卫，但应遵守国际人道主义法，保护平民安全”。 ”。

China has condemned violence and attacks on civilians in the conflict, and while Wang has declared Israel's actions "beyond the scope of self-defence" he has not named Hamas in his comments.

中国谴责冲突中的暴力和针对平民的袭击，虽然王宣称以色列的行动“超出自卫范围”，但他在评论中没有点名哈马斯。

In a separate phone conversation with Palestinian Foreign Minister Riyad al-Maliki, Wang said he "deeply sympathises" with the people of Gaza, adding that they need security and efforts to promote peace, not weapons or geopolitical calculations.

王毅在与巴勒斯坦外长马利基的单独电话交谈中表示，他对加沙人民“深表同情”，并补充说，他们需要安全和促进和平的努力，而不是武器或地缘政治算计。

China calls for the convening of a "more authoritative, wide-ranging and effective international peace conference" soon, Wang said.

王说，中国呼吁尽快召开“更有权威、更广泛、更有效的国际和平会议”。

Wang's comments come days before he visits Washington Oct. 26-28. He will meet with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken and President Joe Biden's national security advisor Jake Sullivan, senior Biden administration officials said on Monday, declining to say if he will meet with Biden as well.

王毅是在 10 月 26 日至 28 日访问华盛顿前几天发表上述言论的。拜登政府高级官员周一表示，他将与美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯和总统乔·拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文会面，但拒绝透露他是否也会与拜登会面。

The conflict has put China and Russia in separate camps rom the United States over the conflict.

这场冲突使中国和俄罗斯与美国分属于不同的阵营。

China and Russia share the same position that the legitimate national rights of the Palestinian people have not been met. While the US has denounced the Hamas attack, fully supporting Israel's right to defend itself.

中俄立场一致，认为巴勒斯坦人民的合法民族权利没有得到满足。而美国则谴责哈马斯的袭击，全力支持以色列自卫的权利。

China, which has repeatedly urged a ceasefire, also made clear its warships in the Middle East were part of routine escort missions and friendly visits, and not an interference in the conflict, state-controlled Global Times said.

据官方媒体《环球时报》报道，一再敦促停火的中国也明确表示，其军舰在中东是例行护航和友好访问的一部分，而不是干涉冲突。

The newspaper said the spokesperson at the Chinese embassy in the United States has called for an end to the "groundless hyping" over the deployment of Chinese warships to the Middle East in response to reports about several warships stationed in the region.

该报称，针对多艘军舰进驻中东的报道，中国驻美国大使馆发言人呼吁停止对中国军舰在中东部署的“无端炒作”。

item.title: 澳洲航空和中国东方航空撤回向监管机构延长协议的请求
item.description:
Qantas Airways (QAN.AX) said on Tuesday the company and China Eastern Airlines (600115.SS) have withdrawn their application to the Australian competition regulator that sought to extend their joint business.

澳洲航空(QAN.AX)周二表示，该公司和中国东方航空(600115.SS)已撤回向澳大利亚竞争监管机构寻求扩大联合业务的申请。

The announcement comes a month after the Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) said it planned to end a long-surviving partnership between the two airlines over claims it would lessen competition and provide the airlines a chance to hike airfare.

一个月前，澳大利亚竞争与消费者委员会（ACCC）表示，计划终止两家航空公司之间长期存在的合作伙伴关系，理由是这将减少竞争，并为航空公司提供提高机票价格的机会。

The partnership allowed Qantas and China Eastern to coordinate passenger and cargo movement between Australia and China.

此次合作使澳洲航空和东航能够协调澳大利亚和中国之间的客运和货运。

"The airlines have commenced a process to unwind the joint business over the coming weeks, which includes an end to the coordination of pricing and schedules, and the removal of joint marketing material," Qantas said in a statement.

澳洲航空在一份声明中表示：“两家航空公司已开始在未来几周内解除联合业务，其中包括结束定价和航班时刻表的协调，以及删除联合营销材料。”

ACCC did not have an immediate comment.

ACCC 没有立即发表评论。

Recently, Qantas also scrapped its A$611 million ($388.60 million) plan to buy out charter flight operator Alliance Aviation Services (AQZ.AX), after the ACCC blocked the deal.

最近，在 ACCC 阻止交易后，澳洲航空还取消了以 6.11 亿澳元（3.886 亿美元）收购包机运营商 Alliance Aviation Services (AQZ.AX)的计划。

Last week, Australia said it will ask the ACCC to monitor domestic passenger flights in a bid to boost competition in a sector dominated by Qantas, which has been under scrutiny for alleged anti-competitive behaviour.

上周，澳大利亚表示将要求 ACCC 监控国内客运航班，以促进由澳洲航空主导的行业的竞争，该行业因涉嫌反竞争行为而受到审查。

The flagship carrier has been accused of lobbying the federal government to stop rival Qatar Airways from running additional flights to Australia.

这家旗舰航空公司被指控游说联邦政府阻止其竞争对手卡塔尔航空运营更多飞往澳大利亚的航班。

ACCC also sued Qantas in August for selling tickets to thousands of flights after they were cancelled, putting it at risk of huge fines. Long-serving CEO Alan Joyce brought forward his retirement after the scandal.

ACCC还在8月份起诉澳洲航空，称其在数千个航班取消后出售机票，使其面临巨额罚款的风险。丑闻发生后，长期任职的首席执行官艾伦·乔伊斯提前退休。

Earlier this month, the airline said chairman Richard Goyder will step down in late 2024, as it renews its board in an effort to restore trust among investors and fix its battered reputation.

本月早些时候，该航空公司表示，董事长理查德·戈伊德 (Richard Goyder) 将于 2024 年底辞职，并更新董事会，以努力恢复投资者的信任并修复其受损的声誉。

($1 = 1.5723 Australian dollars)

(1 美元 = 1.5723 澳元)

item.title: 加拿大称与中国有关的“垃圾邮件”活动针对议员和总理特鲁多
item.description:
The Canadian government said on Monday it detected a China-linked "Spamouflage" campaign that involved bots posting disinformation and propaganda on the social media accounts of members of parliament, including Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.

加拿大政府周一表示，发现了与中国有关的“Spamouflage”活动，该活动涉及机器人在包括总理贾斯汀·特鲁多在内的议会成员的社交媒体账户上发布虚假信息和宣传。

The Spamouflage campaign, using networks of new and hijacked social media accounts to post bulk messages, took place in August and September, and targeted dozens of lawmakers from across the political spectrum, the foreign ministry said in a statement.

外交部在一份声明中表示，Spamouflage 活动于 8 月和 9 月发生，利用新的和被劫持的社交媒体帐户网络发布大量信息，目标是来自不同政治派别的数十名议员。

The messages included accusations against the lawmakers of criminal and ethical violations, a claim that Hawaiian wildfires were caused by a secret U.S. military "weather weapon" and deepfake videos.

这些信息包括对立法者刑事和道德违规的指控，声称夏威夷山火是由美军秘密“气象武器”引起的，以及深度伪造视频。

Thousands of such comments in English and French were posted on the lawmakers' Facebook and X accounts, and the government worked with the platforms to get the bot networks removed.

立法者的 Facebook 和 X 帐户上发布了数千条此类英语和法语评论，政府与这些平台合作，删除了机器人网络。

"This campaign could discourage and make it difficult for MPs to carry out their duties and may dissuade MPs and diaspora communities in Canada from speaking out on issues which concern them," said a foreign ministry report about the incident.

外交部关于该事件的一份报告称：“这场运动可能会阻碍国会议员履行职责，并使其难以履行职责，并可能阻止加拿大国会议员和侨民社区就他们关心的问题发表意见。”

In a statement, the Chinese embassy in Canada said Beijing has never interfered in the internal affairs of other countries. It said the accusations were a "blatant smear campaign" and that Canada was a "downright liar and disseminator of false information".

中国驻加拿大大使馆在一份声明中表示，北京从未干涉别国内政。声明称，这些指控是“公然的诽谤活动”，加拿大是“彻头彻尾的骗子和虚假信息的传播者”。

"For some time now, the Canadian side has been falsely accusing China of spreading false information against Canadian politicians, a move that is in itself a dissemination of false information, in the absence of any direct and substantive evidence," the embassy statement said, adding that Canada should do more to improve and develop bilateral relations.

使馆声明称，一段时间以来，加方在没有任何直接和实质性证据的情况下，错误地指责中方散布针对加拿大政客的虚假信息，此举本身就是散布虚假信息。加方应为改善和发展双边关系作出更多努力。

China-Canada relations turned icy in late 2018 when Canadian police detained a Chinese telecommunications executive. Shortly after, Beijing arrested two Canadians on spying charges. All three have since been released.

2018年底，加拿大警方拘留了一名中国电信高管，中加关系陷入冰点。不久之后，北京以间谍罪逮捕了两名加拿大人。三人均已被释放。

Ottawa has also accused Beijing of trying to interfere in its affairs through various schemes, including illegal police stations and the targeting of lawmakers. China has strongly denied all such allegations.

渥太华还指责北京试图通过各种计划干涉其事务，包括非法警察局和针对立法者。中国坚决否认所有此类指控。

In September, the Trudeau government announced an independent public inquiry into allegations of attempted foreign meddling by China, Russia and others.

9月，特鲁多政府宣布对中国、俄罗斯和其他国家试图进行外国干涉的指控进行独立公开调查。

item.title: 中美官员会晤讨论宏观经济发展
item.description:
Officials from the United States and China on Monday held a two-hour long virtual meeting to discuss domestic and global macroeconomic developments, the U.S. Treasury Department said, calling the meeting "productive and substantive".

美国财政部表示，美国和中国官员周一举行了长达两个小时的虚拟会议，讨论国内和全球宏观经济发展，称会议“富有成效且具有实质性”。

THE TAKE

Ties between the world's two largest economies have been strained in recent years due to a number of issues including Taiwan, the origins of the COVID-19 pandemic, allegations of spying, human rights issues and trade tariffs.

近年来，由于台湾、COVID-19 大流行的起源、间谍指控、人权问题和贸易关税等一系列问题，全球最大的两个经济体之间的关系一直紧张。

Senior officials from both sides have been meeting each other in recent months to lay the ground for an expected meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping in San Francisco in November.

近几个月来，双方高级官员一直在会面，为美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平预计将于 11 月在旧金山举行的会晤奠定基础。

KEY QUOTES

"Today, the United States and the People's Republic of China held the first meeting of the Economic Working Group (EWG), which serves as an ongoing channel to discuss and facilitate progress on bilateral economic policy matters," the Treasury Department said.

美国财政部表示：“今天，美国和中华人民共和国举行了经济工作组（EWG）第一次会议，该会议是讨论双边经济政策问题并促进取得进展的持续渠道。”

China's finance ministry said the two sides had "in-depth, frank and constructive" talks, and also discussed bilateral cooperation in "addressing global challenges".

中国财政部表示，双方进行了“深入、坦诚、建设性”的会谈，并讨论了两国在“应对全球挑战”方面的合作。

Both sides will continue to maintain communication, the ministry said.

外交部表示，双方将继续保持沟通。

U.S. and Chinese officials also raised "areas of concern," statements from the two sides said, without elaborating. The meeting was led by senior officials from the U.S. Treasury Department and China's finance ministry.

双方声明称，美国和中国官员还提出了“令人担忧的领域”，但没有详细说明。会议由美国财政部和中国财政部的高级官员主持。

The EWG was launched last month following U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's trip to Beijing in July. It was launched in parallel with a financial working group, which will hold its first meeting on Wednesday.

专家工作组于美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦 (Janet Yellen ) 7 月访问北京后于上个月成立。它是与金融工作组同时启动的，该工作组将于周三举行第一次会议。

CONTEXT

The economic meeting follows other high-level engagements between the two countries in recent months that have seen visits from U.S. officials to China like Secretary of State Antony Blinken in June, Yellen in July and Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo in August.

这次经济会议是在近几个月两国举行其他高层接触之后举行的，美国官员如六月的国务卿安东尼·布林肯、七月的耶伦和八月的商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多都访问了中国。

More recently, Blinken met Chinese Vice President Han Zheng in New York and U.S. National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan met Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Malta. China's top diplomat will travel to the United States later this week to meet Blinken.

最近，布林肯在纽约会见了中国国家副主席韩正，美国国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文在马耳他会见了中国外交部长王毅。中国最高外交官将于本周晚些时候前往美国会见布林肯。

item.title: 欧盟尚未准备好对中国风电行业进行正式调查 - 消息人士
item.description:
The European Union still lacks "very clear evidence" of unfair practices to launch a formal probe into China's wind power industry that has become a cut-price competitor to Europe's, an EU official said.

一位欧盟官员表示，欧盟仍缺乏“非常明确的证据”证明存在不公平做法，无法对中国风电行业发起正式调查，因为中国风电行业已成为欧洲的低价竞争对手。

In a leaked wind energy proposal last week, the Commission said it would scrutinise foreign subsidies as part of a broader action plan to support its struggling wind industry that is fast losing its leadership position.

在上周泄露的风能提案中，欧盟委员会表示，将审查外国补贴，作为更广泛行动计划的一部分，以支持正在迅速失去领导地位的陷入困境的风能行业。

The EU official said China feared the EU would immediately look at punitive measures on its wind and hydrogen electrolyser industries after the surprise probe on its automakers.

这位欧盟官员表示，中国担心欧盟在对中国汽车制造商进行意外调查后，会立即考虑对其风能和氢电解行业采取惩罚措施。

"The announcement of the investigation on the EVs (electric vehicles) was a bit of a shock because it was announced in such a political speech and a change of tune from traditional openness. China interpreted it as a foregone conclusion that they were already taking measures," the official said.

“宣布对EV（电动汽车）进行调查有点令人震惊，因为它是在这样的政治演讲中宣布的，并且改变了传统的开放态度。中国将其解读为他们已经采取措施的既定结论，”该官员说道。

EU President Ursula von der Leyen announced an investigation last month into whether to set punitive tariffs on cheaper Chinese electric vehicles that are seen as "flooding" the bloc's market.

欧盟主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩上个月宣布一项调查，调查是否对被视为“充斥”欧盟市场的廉价中国电动汽车征收惩罚性关税。

As for wind, the EU official said that "at this stage" the Commission lacked sufficient basis to go further.

至于风能，欧盟官员表示，“现阶段”欧盟委员会缺乏进一步采取行动的充分依据。

"You need to have very clear evidence that there is an unfair practice... (the Commission) have received reports and indications that leave you with some doubts, particularly about the financial conditions - deferred payments, you pay only when you produce electricity, etc.," the official said.

“你需要有非常明确的证据证明存在不公平的做法......（委员会）收到的报告和迹象让你产生一些疑问，特别是关于财务状况 - 延期付款，只有在发电时才付费，等等，”该官员说道。

"None of the giant European producers would be able to afford not paying for their project for 5-6 years until its producing electricity. These make you wonder but these are not substantiated evidence that there is a trade violation."

“欧洲大型生产商都无法承担在其项目发电前 5 至 6 年内不支付费用的后果。这些让你感到好奇，但这些并没有确凿的证据表明存在贸易违规。”

The EU has seen its star renewable energy industry - wind - take a hit since 2021 in part due to inflation but also sudden and strong global competition particularly from China.

自 2021 年以来，欧盟的明星可再生能源产业——风能——受到了打击，部分原因是通货膨胀，以及突然而激烈的全球竞争，尤其是来自中国的竞争。

While U.S. President Joe Biden's Inflation Reduction Act sent shockwaves through the EU last year, the EU official said Asian competition with its "lack of transparency and subsidies" was now seen as a bigger risk to its clean energy industry.

尽管美国总统乔·拜登的通胀削减法案去年给欧盟带来了冲击，但这位欧盟官员表示，亚洲“缺乏透明度和补贴”的竞争现在被视为对其清洁能源行业构成的更大风险。

Europe's main turbine makers all posted operating losses in 2022, putting the EU's renewable targets and energy security at risk. Final investment decisions on offshore wind farms sank last year.

欧洲主要涡轮机制造商均公布 2022 年运营亏损，使欧盟的可再生能源目标和能源安全面临风险。去年，海上风电场的最终投资决定被搁置。

"The spirit of this package is not something the Commission does very often," the official added.

这位官员补充说：“该一揽子计划的精神并不是委员会经常做的事情。”

"We have one of our jewels is at risk. We need to do everything in our power to make sure this story stays a European story."

“我们的一件珠宝面临风险。我们需要尽一切努力确保这个故事成为欧洲的故事。”

item.title: 贝恩资本与中国 DNE 集团组建价值 2.5 亿美元的工业地产合资企业
item.description:
Bain Capital and Chinese industrial real estate developer and operator DNE Group said on Tuesday they formed a joint venture with a $250 million equity commitment, as the U.S. firm looks for investment opportunities in manufacturing park assets in China.

贝恩资本与中国工业房地产开发商和运营商 DNE 集团周二表示，他们成立了一家合资企业，股权承诺为 2.5 亿美元，这家美国公司正在中国寻找制造业园区资产的投资机会。

The initial batch of assets the joint venture will invest in are located in China's eastern industrial hub, the Yangtze River Delta area, the companies said in a joint statement, which did not provide a breakdown of the funding from each partner.

两家公司在一份联合声明中表示，合资企业将投资的首批资产位于中国东部工业中心长江三角洲地区，但该声明没有提供各合作伙伴的资金明细。

DNE will manage projects for the joint venture while Bain Capital acts as the strategic investor, according to the statement.

声明称，DNE 将管理合资企业的项目，而贝恩资本则担任战略投资者。

Beijing has previously signalled it was keen to upgrade its vast manufacturing sector and encouraged investment in advanced manufacturing areas such as chipmaking, data centres, robotics and life sciences, amid an unstable post-pandemic economic recovery and growing geopolitical tensions.

北京此前曾表示，在疫情后经济复苏不稳定和地缘政治紧张局势加剧的情况下，它热衷于升级其庞大的制造业，并鼓励对芯片制造、数据中心、机器人和生命科学等先进制造业领域的投资。

DNE provides smart manufacturing facilities that serve producers of products such as automobile parts and integrated circuits-related equipment, according to its website.

据其网站称，DNE提供智能制造设施，为汽车零部件和集成电路相关设备等产品生产商提供服务。

It also develops and operates real estate sites related to sectors such as logistics, cold chains and life sciences, and operates office buildings.

它还开发和运营与物流、冷链和生命科学等行业相关的房地产场地，并运营办公楼。

The Shanghai-based company, which was created after the merger in 2021 of Warburg Pincus-backed D&J China and New Ease China, has raised funds from strategic investors such as Sequoia Capital and Swiss private equity firm Partners Group.

这家总部位于上海的公司是华平投资支持的东久中国和新宜中国于 2021 年合并后创建的，已从红杉资本和瑞士私募股权公司 Partners Group 等战略投资者那里筹集了资金。

item.title: 美国官员称，中国王毅将在中东紧张局势中访问华盛顿
item.description:
China's top diplomat Wang Yi will travel to the United States later this week, senior Biden administration officials said on Monday, in a long-anticipated visit that comes amid soaring tensions in the Middle East, which U.S. officials hope Beijing can help contain.

拜登政府高级官员周一表示，中国最高外交官王毅将于本周晚些时候访问美国，此次访问是在中东紧张局势加剧之际进行的，美国官员希望北京能够帮助遏制这一局势。

Wang will visit Washington from Oct. 26-28 and meet with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken and President Joe Biden's national security advisor Jake Sullivan, officials said, declining to say if he will meet with Biden as well.

官员们称，王毅将于10月26日至28日访问华盛顿，并会见美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯和总统乔·拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文，但拒绝透露他是否也会与拜登会面。

The trip will be the highest-level in-person engagement ahead of an expected meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping in San Francisco in November. It is also the long-awaited reciprocal visit after several top U.S. officials including Blinken visited Beijing this summer.

这次访问将是美国总统乔·拜登和中国领导人习近平预计将于 11 月在旧金山举行的会晤之前的最高级别的面对面接触。这也是继布林肯等多位美国高官今年夏天访华后期待已久的互访。

Washington's top priority has been to ensure the intense competition between the world's two largest economies and their disagreements over a host of issues from trade to Taiwan and the South China Sea does not veer into conflict.

华盛顿的首要任务是确保世界最大两个经济体之间的激烈竞争，以及它们在贸易、台湾和南海等一系列问题上的分歧不会演变成冲突。

"We continue to believe that direct face-to-face diplomacy is the best way to raise challenging issues, address misperception and miscommunication, and explore working with the Chinese where our interests intersect," said one official, who briefed reporters on the trip on condition of anonymity.

一位官员向记者介绍了此次访问的情况，他表示：“我们仍然相信，直接面对面的外交是提出挑战性问题、解决误解和沟通不畅以及探索与中方在利益交叉点进行合作的最佳方式。”匿名的条件。

The visit also comes as Hamas' Oct. 7 attacks and Israel's response dominate global headlines, even as Russia's war in Ukraine grinds on.

这次访问正值哈马斯 10 月 7 日的袭击和以色列的反应成为全球头条新闻，尽管俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争仍在继续。

Washington is sending military aid to Israel and Ukraine, while Beijing has grown closer to Russia since the Ukraine war began and has called for a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas.

华盛顿正在向以色列和乌克兰提供军事援助，而自乌克兰战争爆发以来，北京与俄罗斯的关系日益密切，并呼吁以色列和哈马斯之间停火。

The Israel-Hamas war and Russia's war in Ukraine would both be discussed, a second official said, adding that the U.S. would "push the Chinese to take a more constructive approach on both.”

另一位官员表示，以色列与哈马斯的战争和俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争都将被讨论，并补充说美国将“促使中国在这两个问题上采取更具建设性的态度”。

Washington has placed importance on China's ability to influence Iran. Blinken, during his whirlwind trip last week to the Middle East, held a phone call with Wang asking him to use Beijing's clout in the region to ensure the conflict does not widen.

华盛顿非常重视中国影响伊朗的能力。布林肯上周旋风般地前往中东，与王通电话，要求他利用北京在该地区的影响力，确保冲突不会扩大。

China has consistently called for restraint and a ceasefire in response to Israel's bombardment of Gaza following the Hamas attacks that killed 1,400 Israelis but has also sharpened its criticism of Israel.

在哈马斯袭击造成1,400名以色列人死亡后，中国一直呼吁克制和停火，以回应以色列对加沙的轰炸，但也加剧了对以色列的批评。

Territorial disputes in the South and East China Seas would also be on the agenda during Wang's visit, the U.S. officials said, adding that Washington was deeply concerned by China's "destabilizing and dangerous actions" in the South China Sea.

美国官员表示，南海和东海的领土争端也将列入王毅访问期间的议程，并补充说，华盛顿对中国在南海的“破坏稳定和危险的行为”深感担忧。

The Philippines, a U.S. ally, on Monday accused Chinese coastguard vessels of "intentionally" colliding with its vessels on a resupply mission, in the most serious incident yet in the waters around the disputed Second Thomas shoal.

美国盟友菲律宾周一指责中国海警船只“故意”与执行补给任务的中国船只相撞，这是有争议的仁爱礁周围海域迄今为止最严重的事件。

Re-establishing military-to-military ties with China remains a top U.S. priority, the officials said, adding that meant sustained communications down the ranks and that China's apparent lack of a defense minister would not be an obstacle.

官员们表示，与中国重建军事关系仍然是美国的首要任务，并补充说，这意味着持续的高层沟通，而且中国明显缺乏国防部长不会成为障碍。

Defense Minister Li Shangfu has not been seen in public for nearly two months amid a corruption probe.

由于腐败调查，国防部长李尚福已近两个月没有公开露面。

Reporting by Humeyra Pamuk and Simon Lewis, editing by Deepa Babington

item.title: WPP 解雇因在中国受贿指控而被拘留的高管
item.description:
British advertising giant WPP (WPP.L) said on Monday it had fired an executive at its GroupM media agency in China after authorities detained the unnamed person on charges of bribery last week.

英国广告巨头 WPP (WPP.L)周一表示，在当局上周以行贿罪名拘留了一名未透露姓名的高管后，该公司已解雇了其在中国的群邑媒体代理机构的一名高管。

The executive was one of four people linked to GroupM questioned by authorities in Shanghai, Reuters reported on Saturday, citing two people with knowledge of the matter.

据路透社周六援引两名知情人士的话报道，该高管是上海当局接受询问的四名群邑相关人士之一。

Two former staff were also detained, one of the people said, while the fourth, GroupM China's CEO and country managing director for WPP China, Patrick Xu, was questioned by police but not detained.

其中一名知情人士称，两名前员工也被拘留，而第四名前员工、群邑中国首席执行官兼 WPP 中国区董事总经理徐志伟 (Patrick Xu) 接受了警方讯问，但没有被拘留。

WPP, the world's largest advertising group, said it was cooperating with the authorities and it was conducting its own investigation.

全球最大的广告集团 WPP 表示，正在与当局合作，并正在进行自己的调查。

"We are terminating the executive's employment with the company, and GroupM is suspending trade with any external organisation we understand to be part of the police enquiries," the company said in a statement on Monday.

该公司在周一的一份声明中表示：“我们将终止该高管在公司的雇佣关系，群邑将暂停与任何据我们所知属于警方调查一部分的外部组织的贸易往来。”

"We are absolutely committed to behaving in accordance with the law and our own code of conduct, and will take all necessary action to ensure this is the case within our business."

“我们绝对致力于按照法律和我们自己的行为准则行事，并将采取一切必要行动，确保我们的业务做到这一点。”

There has been no official confirmation regarding the nature of the investigation, but one of the sources, who declined to be named citing the sensitivity of the situation, said it was related to rebate mismanagement.

目前还没有关于调查性质的官方确认，但一位因情况敏感性而拒绝透露姓名的消息人士表示，这与回扣管理不善有关。

The investigation is likely to reverberate around China's foreign business community, which is already unnerved by a widespread crackdown on consulting and due diligence firms as well as a new national security law.

这项调查可能会在中国的外国商界引起反响，中国的外国商界已经因对咨询和尽职调查公司的广泛打压以及新的国家安全法而感到不安。

China is a major growth engine for WPP and GroupM, with global executives vocal about their intention to invest in the market long-term in recent months.

中国是 WPP 和群邑的主要增长引擎，近几个月来，全球高管纷纷表达了长期投资该市场的意图。

Reporting by Paul Sandle in London and Aatrayee Chatterjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Pooja Desai; editing by David Evans

item.title: Prada 考虑双重上市但不考虑并购 - 首席执行官
item.description:
Hong Kong-listed Prada is looking at a dual listing on the Milan bourse, though it is not the Italian fashion group's priority, the Chief Executive said on Monday.

行政长官周一表示，在香港上市的普拉达 (Prada) 正在考虑在米兰证券交易所双重上市，但这不是这家意大利时尚集团的首要任务。

A dual listing in Europe would help Prada widen its investor base, as some investment funds can only put money in European or U.S. stocks.

在欧洲双重上市将有助于普拉达扩大其投资者基础，因为一些投资基金只能将资金投资于欧洲或美国股票。

Andrea Guerra added that Prada had no need for M&A deals in the next 3-5 years, but would carry on with organic growth, "to have the role that belongs to us", speaking at a fashion conference.

Andrea Guerra 在一场时尚会议上发表讲话时补充道，Prada 在未来 3-5 年内不需要进行并购交易，但将继续有机增长，“以扮演属于我们的角色”。

Reporting by Elisa Anzolin, writing by Giulia Segreti, editing by Gianluca Semeraro

item.title: 在中国东北，俄罗斯和中国企业签署从制造业到农业的交易
item.description:
Chinese and Russian companies attending a regional conference in northeastern China signed a raft of cooperation deals on Monday in sectors ranging from manufacturing and logistics to e-commerce and agriculture, Chinese state media reported.

据中国官方媒体报道，参加中国东北地区会议的中国和俄罗斯企业周一签署了一系列合作协议，涉及制造、物流、电子商务和农业等领域。

The conference in Shenyang, the capital of Liaoning province, followed last week's meeting in Beijing between Russian President Vladimir Putin and China's President Xi Jinping. Russian local government officials, business representatives as well as nearly 800 Chinese companies hoping to enter the Russian market were attending the conference.

继上周俄罗斯总统普京和中国国家主席习近平在北京举行会晤之后，这次会议在辽宁省省会沉阳举行。俄罗斯地方政府官员、企业代表以及近800家希望进入俄罗斯市场的中国企业出席了会议。

China has urged increased cross-border connectivity with Russia and deeper economic cooperation despite disapproval from the West after Russian forces invaded Ukraine last year, with northeast China - comprising the provinces of Liaoning, Heilongjiang and Jilin - gaining new strategic significance as a zone of bilateral trade and commerce.

尽管去年俄罗斯军队入侵乌克兰后遭到西方的反对，但中国仍敦促加强与俄罗斯的跨境互联互通并深化经济合作，中国东北地区（包括辽宁、黑龙江和吉林）作为双边合作区获得了新的战略意义。贸易和商业。

In January to September, 40 Russian firms set up businesses in Liaoning, China's national broadcaster reported on Monday.

据中国国家广播电台周一报道，今年 1 月至 9 月，40 家俄罗斯企业在辽宁设立企业。

Liaoning's outbound shipments to Russia soared 82.3% in the first nine months from a year earlier to 42.64 billion yuan ($5.83 billion).

今年前9个月，辽宁省对俄罗斯的出口额同比猛增82.3%，达到426.4亿元人民币（58.3亿美元）。

In March, a new cargo hub for China-Europe freight trains was put into operation in Shenyang, with a train carrying 55 containers departing for Russia to mark the hub's inauguration.

今年3月，中欧 班列新货运枢纽在沈阳投入运营，一列满载55个集装箱的班列启程前往俄罗斯，标志着中欧班列枢纽的开通。

In May, Chinese customs said the landlocked province of Jilin would be able to use Vladivostok, the biggest port in the Russian Far East, to ship goods to Zhoushan and Jiaxing in the eastern Chinese province of Zhejiang from June, cutting costs and transportation time for Jilin cargo bound for eastern China.

今年5月，中国海关表示，从6月起，内陆省份吉林省将能够使用俄罗斯远东地区最大的港口符拉迪沃斯托克向中国东部浙江省的舟山和嘉兴运送货物，从而降低了成本和运输时间。吉林货物发往华东地区。

Heilongjiang should also become a "pivotal" gateway for China's opening up in the north, Xi declared in September, saying the province ought to play an active role in safeguarding national defence, food, and energy security.

习近平9月宣布， 黑龙江也应该成为中国北方开放的“枢纽”门户，并表示该省应该在维护国防、粮食和能源安全方面发挥积极作用。

In September, bilateral trade between Russia and China surged to $21.18 billion, the highest since February 2022 when Russia began the war in Ukraine, according to the data by Chinese General Administration of Customs earlier this month.

中国海关总署本月早些时候的数据显示，9月份，俄罗斯和中国之间的双边贸易额飙升至211.8亿美元，这是自2022年2月俄罗斯发动乌克兰战争以来的最高水平。

($1 = 7.3172 Chinese yuan renminbi)

（1 美元 = 7.3172 人民币）

Reporting by Ryan Woo and Ellen Zhang; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore

item.title: 中国、菲律宾就南海冲突提出贸易指责
item.description:
Summary:
  • China, Philippines collision the latest maritime confrontation

    中国、菲律宾碰撞最新海上对抗
  • China coastguard says 'lawfully' blocked Philippine vessels

    中国海警称拦截菲律宾船只“合法”
  • Manila task force says collision endangered Philippine crew

    马尼拉特遣部队称碰撞危及菲律宾船员
  • U.S. envoy condemns China's action, expresses support for Manila

    美国特使谴责中国行为，表示支持马尼拉

China and the Philippines traded accusations over a collision in disputed waters of the South China Sea as Chinese vessels blocked Philippine boats supplying forces there on Sunday in the latest of a series of maritime confrontations.

中国和菲律宾就南海争议海域发生的碰撞事件互相指责，中国船只周日拦截了菲律宾向该海域提供部队的船只，这是一系列海上对抗中的最新一起。

The two countries have had numerous run-ins in the South China Sea in recent months, especially near the disputed Second Thomas Shoal, part of the Spratly Islands.

近几个月来，两国在南海发生了多次冲突，特别是在有争议的仁爱礁（南沙群岛的一部分）附近。

The Philippines has sent supplies to troops stationed on a rusted World War Two-era transport ship used as an outpost on the shoal, prompting China's coastguard to repeatedly deploy vessels to block the resupply missions.

菲律宾已向驻扎在一艘生锈的第二次世界大战时期运输船上的部队运送物资，该运输船用作浅滩的前哨基地，促使中国海警多次部署船只阻止补给任务。

In the incident early on Sunday, China's coastguard said there had been a "slight collision" between one of its ships and the Philippine boat while the coastguard was "lawfully" blocking the boat from transporting "illegal construction materials" to the warship.

在周日早些时候的事件中，中国海警表示，中国的一艘船只与菲律宾船只发生了“轻微碰撞”，而海警正在“合法”阻止该船向军舰运送“非法建筑材料”。

Manila responded by condemning "in the strongest degree" the "dangerous blocking manoeuvres" of the Chinese vessel.

马尼拉对此作出回应，“最强烈地”谴责中国船只的“危险拦截行为”。

China's "dangerous, irresponsible and illegal actions" were "in violation of Philippine sovereignty, sovereign rights and jurisdiction", Manila's Task Force for the West Philippine Sea said in a statement.

马尼拉西菲律宾海特遣部队在一份声明中表示，中国的“危险、不负责任和非法行为”“侵犯了菲律宾的主权、主权权利和管辖权”。

Beijing claims sovereignty over almost the entire South China Sea, including parts of the exclusive economic zones of Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Vietnam. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.

北京声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，其中包括文莱、印度尼西亚、马来西亚、菲律宾和越南的部分专属经济区。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

"China has maintained great restraint and patience on the issue," the Chinese foreign ministry said on Sunday.

中国外交部周日表示：“中方在这个问题上一直保持着极大的克制和耐心。”

China has long maintained intensive communication with Manila, which has, however, disregarded China's goodwill, the ministry said in a statement.

外交部在一份声明中表示，中方长期以来与马尼拉保持着密切沟通，但马尼拉却无视中方的善意。

China will continue to take the necessary measures in accordance with domestic and international laws to safeguard its territorial sovereignty, it said.

中方将继续根据国内法和国际法采取必要措施，维护领土主权。

DANGEROUS PROVOCATIONS

The U.S. sided with the Philippines, offering support to its ally. In a statement on Sunday, the U.S. State Department said China's actions amounted to repeated "harassment" in the South China Sea, and that they were "dangerous and unlawful."

美国站在菲律宾一边，向其盟友提供支持。美国国务院在周日的一份声明中表示，中国的行为相当于在南海的反复“骚扰”，并且是“危险且非法的”。

The Canadian and Japanese embassies in Manila also expressed support for the Philippines and alarm over the collision. The European Union's ambassador, Luc Veron, said: "These incidents, their repetition and intensification are dangerous and very disturbing"

加拿大和日本驻马尼拉大使馆也表达了对菲律宾的支持，并对撞船事件表示震惊。欧盟大使吕克·贝隆表示：“这些事件及其重复和加剧是危险且非常令人不安的”

Manila's relations with Beijing have soured under President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., who has strengthened military engagement with Washington since taking office last year. The Pentagon said in May it would protect the Philippines if its coastguard came under attack "anywhere in the South China Sea".

在小费迪南德·马科斯总统的领导下，马尼拉与北京的关系恶化，他自去年上任以来加强了与华盛顿的军事接触。五角大楼五月份表示，如果菲律宾海岸警卫队在“南海任何地方”受到攻击，它将保护菲律宾。

Last week, the Philippine military demanded China stop its "dangerous and offensive" actions after a Chinese navy ship shadowed and attempted to cut off a Philippine navy vessel conducting a resupply mission.

上周，一艘中国海军舰艇跟踪并试图切断一艘执行补给任务的菲律宾海军舰艇后，菲律宾军方要求中国停止其“危险和进攻性”行动。

Sunday's collision occurred during a routine resupply mission of a boat contracted by the Philippine armed forces, Manila said.

马尼拉称，周日的碰撞事故发生在菲律宾武装部队承包的一艘船只执行例行补给任务期间。

In another incident during the same resupply mission, it said a Philippine coastguard vessel's port side was bumped by a Chinese maritime militia vessel.

在同一补给任务期间发生的另一起事件中，一艘菲律宾海岸警卫队船只的左舷被一艘中国海上民兵船只撞到。

The actions of the Chinese coastguard vessel "imperilled the safety of the crew" of the Philippine boat, the task force said.

该工作组表示，中国海警船的行为“危及了菲律宾船只船员的安全”。

China's coastguard said in a statement the Philippine vessel had ignored repeated warnings, crossed the bow of the Chinese ship and "deliberately provoked trouble", causing the collision.

中国海警在一份声明中表示，菲律宾船只无视中国船只的多次警告，越过中国船只的船头，“故意寻衅滋事”，造成碰撞。

"The Philippines behaviour seriously violates the international rules on avoiding collisions at sea and threatens the navigation safety of our vessels," the coastguard said.

菲律宾海警表示，菲律宾的行为严重违反海上避碰国际规则，威胁我船航行安全。

Manila grounded the BRP Sierra Madre warship in 1999 as part of its sovereignty claim to the Second Thomas Shoal, which lies within its 200-mile exclusive economic zone.

马尼拉于 1999 年搁浅了 BRP Sierra Madre 军舰，作为其对位于其 200 海里专属经济区内的仁爱礁主权主张的一部分。

Reporting by Ethan Wang, Bernard Orr and Ryan Woo in Beijing and Enrico Dela Cruz in Manila; Additional reporting by Kanishka Singh in Washington; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Barbara Lewis and Jason Neely
